thread.title: GH Recap: The nursing staff prepares to fight back against hospital cuts
thread.title_full: GH Recap: The nursing staff prepares to fight back against hospital cuts

title: GH Recap: The nursing staff prepares to fight back against hospital cuts
text:
GH Recap: The nursing staff prepares to fight back against hospital cuts 
Dustin Cushman Tuesday, February 7th, 2017 
Tuesday February 7, 2017: Jason and Curtis get a lead, Alexis advises Lulu, Hayden clashes with the nurses, and Michael struggles to save GH. Pin 
Curtis and Jason spy on Julian and Liv from outside her new shop. In a van, they use Brick’s equipment to listen in as Julian tells Liv that he’s tired of living in fear of his own sister. Jason sees him talking to a blond though his camera lens, but he doesn’t see her face. Back inside, Liv orders Julian to get her GH. He leaves. In the van, Jason doesn’t understand why Julian would have to meet Ava in secret, and what the symbol of reincarnation has to do with either them. Curtis feels it’s clear that it was Ava behind the bombing and asks if they will tell Sonny what they know. 
More: GH Spoiler Video: Don't make an enemy of Sonny 
At GH, Michael and Hayden discuss the cuts that need to be made to keep GH open. Nurse Amy overhears them saying how hard this will be, and realizes they are going to be laying off people. Amy runs off upset and right into Liz, who can see something is wrong. Amy tells her to ask her sister Hayden about it. Later, Hayden runs into her sister, and Liz confronts her about the rumors that she is cutting the staff. Amy and Felix join in as Liz and Hayden argue about the cuts. Hayden explains reducing staff is the only way to keep the hospital open at this point. Hayden goes back to her office and tries to find a way to cut costs without cutting jobs. Meanwhile, Felix tells Liz and Amy they will fight these cuts. 
At Crimson, Maxie confronts Nina about keeping Lulu away from her daughter. Nina tells her that Lulu is the one fighting for sole custody and she’s not thinking about Charlotte’s feelings. Maxie defends her friend, while Nina backs her husband. Nina suggests they agree to disagree and not discuss the subject at work. Maxie says she will try to do that, but their work is interrupted when Charlotte’s nanny calls with an emergency. Charlotte is dropped off at Crimson to spend the day there because her nanny has to attend to her sick sister. Later, Nina is forced to leave Charlotte with Maxie when she’s required to take a meeting from an angry advertiser. 
Related: Grey's Anatomy recap: Richard makes life difficult for the new Chief 
Alexis, working for Diane, meets with Lulu and Dante at the Metro Court to discuss fighting Valentin for custody of Charlotte. They bring Alexis up to speed with everything that has occurred and wonder if they have any chance at getting full custody of the girl. 
Nelle sneaks into Sonny’s bedroom and hides the fancy bra she bought behind his bed. She grabs some tax records from the closet and brings them back down to Sonny and Carly. She tells them that she’ll take them to Carly’s office and get started on the paper work for the foundation in Morgan’s honor they are setting up. She leaves and Jason arrives to see Sonny, so Carly leaves them to talk. Jason tells Sonny they are getting close to identifying the mystery woman, but doesn’t tell him what he and Curtis heard. Sonny feels Jason is leaving something out of his report. Jason promises to get him the truth and leaves. Sonny makes a call to Brick and asks him to bring him the remote backup recording from the surveillance equipment. 
Michael heads to the bar at Metro Court and runs into Nelle. He talks to her about his dilemma trying to save GH, which is going to result in budget cuts. As they talk, Carly approaches with Nelle’s flowers and tells her how beautiful they are. Nelle takes the flowers and gets back to work. Carly talks with Michael about Nelle’s flowers, which she thinks are from the mystery man. Michael tells his mom that Joss peeked at the card, and it was signed with the initial S. Meanwhile, Alexis tells Lulu and Dante they have a chance in their case against Valentin, but advises Lulu not to see Charlotte without Valentin’s permission. She tells Lulu to make herself look like the more reasonable parent. Alexis has to get to another appointment, and on her way out runs into Julian. They make small talk, and Julian is glad to learn that Alexis is on her way to an AA meeting. Alexis sings Liv’s praises to him, which unnerves him. He wishes Alexis well and then goes to meet one of the board members, who fills Julian in on delays in purchasing GH. Julian orders him to get the deal made. The man leaves, and Julian calls Liv with an update. Back at their table, Dante gives Lulu a kiss goodbye and heads back to work. Lulu gets a call from Maxie, who tells her to come to Crimson immediately. 
Sam and Jason learn something could be wrong with the baby. 
Maxie tells Lulu this is the perfect opportunity to bond with Charlotte. 
In bed, Kevin wakes Laura up after she had a nightmare. 
Griffin tells Anna that she needs to listen to him. 
Jordan tells Dante that she and Curtis found the person who planted the bomb. 
Curtis visits Ava.
